trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_SEQ_00<tab>Ys Gyuf's eyes light up at the sight of you.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_TODO_00<tab>Remove the flamespores.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Ys Gyuf.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_TODO_02<tab>Remove the flamespores.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_TODO_03<tab>Find the owner of the gaze.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Ys Gyuf.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_000<tab>Ah, to have so many men visit us at once! This is a joyous day indeed!
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_001<tab>If it please you, please give me your patronage. As my patron, I ask that you remove the noxious mushrooms that grow in our cave. Flamespores, they're called.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_002<tab>We would tend to them with magicks, except they leave behind a harmful ash. We've no choice but to pluck them one at a time.

TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_003<tab>Now, you will be curious as to what I have to offer. I am a purveyor of wares that will aid you in your travels. In exchange for your fitting payment, I will give you my choicest items!
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_010<tab>Please let me know when you have removed all the flamespores. Scour every corner of the cave, leave no stone unturned!
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_020<tab>You've already removed the flamespores? How very quick you are!
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_021<tab>Oh, but did you perchance search by the western entrance as well? I'm told that more have cropped up in that area.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_030<tab>I'm told more flamespores have cropped up by the western entrance. Please tend to them as well!
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>As you pluck the last of the flamespores, you sense a gaze from the entrance.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_RYNE_000_041<tab><gasp>
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_RYNE_000_042<tab>I-I wasn't spying on you or anything. I've just finished my task, and...
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_RYNE_000_043<tab>I...I should go and report back.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_050<tab>Ah, you are returned. Have you dealt with the flamespores by the western entrance as well?
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_051<tab>Excellent! No more poisonous spores irritating our noses, for a little while at least!

TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_052<tab>Oh dear, I believe I'm getting sentimental. Having a patron again...it reminds me of the old days. Fair every day, I would carry my wares to the castle to offer in exchange for men's patronage.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_053<tab>Back then the castle wasn't called Lyhe Ghiah. The Voeburtites built it, and they named it Gruenes Licht.
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_054<tab>It was their last bastion in the struggle against sin eaters. And now they're gone, all of them. Nobles and knights and commonfolk alike...
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_055<tab>But enough reminiscing─I must give you what you've earned!
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_056<tab>And if you desire anything else I possess, I would be glad to offer them to you─for a fitting price, of course!
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>Ys Gyuf's shop is now open for business!
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_058<tab>Now, will you be offering your patronage to anyone else? If so, would you consider Wyd Lad?
TEXT_LUCKMB114_03315_YSGYUF_000_059<tab>They've been under the weather of late, and the chance to perform an honorable task would cheer them up.
